title: Civil Servants Threaten to Strike Over Two Days a Week in the Office
description:
Civil servants at the ONS, Britain’s official statistics body, have threatened to go on strike after being asked to work in the office for two days a week.

The post Civil Servants Threaten to Strike Over Two Days a Week in the Office appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: The Plot to Crown Penny Mordaunt as PM
description:
MPs on the Right of the Tory party have held talks with moderates about uniting behind Penny Mordaunt to replace Rishi Sunak, hammering out a pact to neutralise her woke views on gender.

The post The Plot to Crown Penny Mordaunt as PM appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: How Did American Capitalism Mutate Into American Corporatism?
description:
Big Tech companies like Google and Microsoft are not genuinely private, says Jeffrey Tucker. "They are de facto state actors. They all work hand-in-glove and which is the hand and which is the glove is no longer clear."

The post How Did American Capitalism Mutate Into American Corporatism? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: “I Hope They Blow the Tories to Smithereens”: Former Neighbours Actress and Pop Star Holly Valance Declares She is Voting Reform
description:
Former Neighbours actress and pop star Holly Valance has declared she is voting Reform at the next election, saying she hoped the insurgent party would blow the Tories "to smithereens".

The post “I Hope They Blow the Tories to Smithereens”: Former Neighbours Actress and Pop Star Holly Valance Declares She is Voting Reform appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Hope Not Hate Warns of a “Dangerous Radical-Right Insurgency” Involving Tory MPs Jacob Rees-Mogg, John Redwood and Iain Duncan Smith That is “Undermining the Rights of Minorities”
description:
A new Hope Not Hate report warns that Tory MPs like Jacob Rees-Mogg are part of a "Right-wing insurgency undermining minority rights" – showing what's so dangerous about Michael Gove's new definition of 'extremism'.

The post Hope Not Hate Warns of a “Dangerous Radical-Right Insurgency” Involving Tory MPs Jacob Rees-Mogg, John Redwood and Iain Duncan Smith That is “Undermining the Rights of Minorities” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: News Round-Up
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the virus and the vaccines, the ‘climate emergency’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
